Articles.Content:
There was a kraken,

that lived in space.

They said whoever challenged him...

would die!

Their game would freeze up,

their craft would spin wildly,

and they would explode!

The kraken lived far out on the meter,

thousands of km's per hour,

where the computer bytes couldn't get out of the way.

He lived behind a barrier they said no man could ever pass.

They called it the physics barrier!

Then they build a small rocket,

the D-2462, to try and break the physics barrier,

and people came to the low plains of KSC to ride it.

They were called Kerbals,

and no one remembered their names...

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
